name: Deck of Ashes - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
ABOUT THIS CONTENT

All the tracks from Deck of Ashes written by Mark Braga. All songs available with covers, credits and full meta tags.

TRACK LIST

01 Ash Curse
02 Camp Theme
03 Lurking Danger
04 Battle Theme #1
05 Battle Theme #2
06 Battle Theme #3
07 Battle Theme #4
08 Battle Theme #5
09 Battle Theme #6
10 Battle Theme #7
11 No Mercy!

CREDITS

Music composed by Mark Braga.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Betriebssystem: Windows 7/8/10
  • Prozessor: Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2180 2.00GHz
  • Arbeitsspeicher: 512 MB RAM
  • Grafik: GeForce 600M / ATI Radeon HD 5450 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Speicherplatz: 100 MB verfügbarer Speicherplatz
  • Soundkarte: DirectX9 Compatible
